quotes.txt: Good news, everyone!

The one called Zapp will be snu-snu'd by the large women; he that is designated Fry... will be snu-snu'd by the petite women. And Kiff, as the most attractive male, will be snu-snu'd by the most beautiful women of Amazonia, then the large women, then the petite women, then the large women again!
quotes.ep: Amazon Women in the Mood, S3E1

quotes.txt: Cash, cash, cash! Too many bones and not enough cash? Sell your extra bones for cash! Ribs, skulls, spines, even certain little ear bones! The leg bone's connected to the... Cash Bone!
Mix these mixed nuts! I see two almonds touching!

My fellow Earthicans, as I discuss in my book Earth in the Balance, and the much more popular Harry Potter and the Balance of the Earth, we need to defend our planet against pollution as well as dark wizards.

Bigfoot, is that you? I'm not like the others, Bigfoot. I see through the monster coating to the gentle loner inside. I bet you have a wounded raccoon friend that you tenderly nurse back to health while you go, "Rooh! Rooh!" But in the end they shoot you, but you teach us about things.

Men, you're lucky men. Soon, you'll all be fighting for your planet. many of you will be dying for your planet. A few of you will be put through a fine mesh screen for your planet. They will be the luckiest of all.
If you do things right, people won't be sure you've done anything at all.
And now, the man who will lead us in our proud struggle for freedom... Fresh from his bloody triumph over the pacifists of the Ghandi Nebula... 25 star general Zapp Brannigan!
The alien mothership is in orbit here. If we hit that bullseye, the rest of the dominoes will fall like a house of cards. Checkmate.
You're a brave robot, son. But when I'm in command every mission's a suicide mission.
Let us cavort like the Greeks of old! You know the ones I mean...
You are entering the realm which is unusual. Maybe it's magic or contains some kind of monster. The second one. Prepare to enter... The Scary Door.
Oh dear, she's stuck in an infinite loop and he's an idiot! Oh well, that's love for you, I guess.
Valentine's Day's coming? Aw crap! I forgot to get a girlfriend again!
quotes.ep: Put Your Head on My Shoulders, S2E7

quotes.txt: I'm not a robot like you, I don't like having discs crammed into me... unless they're Oreos... and then only in the mouth.
Pathetic human race. Arranging their knowledge by category just made it easier to absorb. Dewey, you fool! Your decimal system has played right into my hands! Ha ha ha ha!
quotes.ep: The Day the Earth Stood Stupid, S3E7

quotes.txt: I was all of history's great robot actors - Acting Unit 0.8; Thespomat; David Duchovny!
I don't want to be an inventor. I want to be something useful like a teacher's aide or a prison guard or a science fiction cartoon writer.
quotes.ep: A Clone of My Own, S2E10

quotes.txt: Good news, everyone! I've taught the toaster to feel love!
Morbo will now introduce the candidates - Puny Human Number One, Puny Human Number Two, and Morbo's good friend Richard Nixon.
quotes.ep: A Head in the Polls, S2E3

quotes.txt: All I want is to be a monkey of moderate intelligence who wears a suit... that's why I'm transferring to business school!
Kif, I have made it with a woman. Inform the men.
quotes.ep: Love's Labours Lost in Space, S1E4

quotes.txt: I'm going to build my own theme park! With blackjack! And hookers! You know what - forget the park!
Brannigan's Law is like Brannigan's love - hard and fast.
In the game of chess you can never let your adversary see your pieces.
quotes.ep: Love's Labours Lost in Space, S1E4

quotes.txt: This concept of 'wuv' confuses and infuriates us!
The female Leela's problem is purely medical. Soon she will drop her eggs and they will hatch and all will be well.

quotes.txt: Maybe you could do more reps with less weight.

quotes.txt: This 'love' intrigues me... teach me to fake it!

quotes.txt: Ohhh, it's all so complicated, with the flowers, and the romance, and the lies upon lies.

quotes.txt: It's a calculator. I ate it to gain it's power.
Oh, Hermes, I've been such a fool. Truth be, I married you for your sexy potato body,but I'm staying with you for your sexy potato head.
quotes.ep: The Six Million Dollar Mon, S7E7

quotes.txt: Don't quote regulation to me! I co-chaired the committee that reviewed the recommendation to revise the color of the book that regulation is in. We kept it gray.

quotes.txt: Beauracrat Conrad, you are technically correct. The best kind of correct.

quotes.txt: Bender, that was the best 40 minute washboard solo I've ever heard! The parts when I was awake blew. My. Mind.

quotes.txt: She's built like a steakhouse, but she handles like a bistro.

quotes.txt: You're probably wondering why your ice cream went away. Well, Susie, the culprit isn't foreigners, it's Global Warming.
Buddha, Zeus, God! One of you, do something!
